code: @Override public Schema readSchema(InputStream in) throws IOException {     DataInputStream dataInputStream = new DataInputStream(in).     if (dataInputStream.readByte() != 0) {         throw new IOException("Unknown data format. Magic number does not match").     } else {         int schemaId = dataInputStream.readInt().         try {             return schemaRegistryClient.getById(schemaId).         } catch (RestClientException e) {             throw new IOException(format("Could not find schema with id %s in registry", schemaId), e).         }     } }
